page.title: 08Black Horse, Nuthurst
page.content: The Black Horse Pub has lots of local {customers}and quite a few outsiders who come from Worthing and Gatwick. Mr and Mrs Cheshire have been in the pub for 3 1/2 years.It has been a pub for{100 years}but built in the{16th {century.}Bank holidays and summer holidays are the busiest time of year. The{opening times}are winter 11.00 am _2.30 pm 6pm _10.30pm except Sundays 11.00_2.00pm. In summer the closing time on weekdays and Saturdays is 11pm.The pub has started doing{cream {teas}this summer and they have had very good progress. The pub is a{free {house}which means it can sell any kind of spirit or beer. They keep five types of beer. Children are not allowed in the pub, only in the garden. They have{morris dancers}- the Bonney Men - twice a year. The cellar is small and kept very cold.
